posts.title: Man Behind Monalisa
posts.author: Leornado Davinchi
posts.content:
Leonardo da Vinci, one of the most famous and influential artists in history, was born in Vinci, Italy, in 1452. Although known primarily for his art, Da Vinci was also an inventor, scientist, and philosopher, and is considered by many to be a true Renaissance genius.

posts.title: Mastering Flexbox and Grid
posts.author: Mary kiani
posts.content:
Bugatti isn't just a car brand â€” it's a statement. A symbol of elegance, precision, and raw power. From the legendary Veyron to the revolutionary Chiron Super Sport, Bugatti has consistently redefined what it means to go fast with style.

The heart of every Bugatti beats with an 8.0-liter quad-turbocharged W16 engine. But it's not just about horsepower (though 1,577 HP is no small feat); it's about balance. Every inch of a Bugatti is engineered for aerodynamic perfection, luxury comfort, and meticulous design.
